sql:
CREATE TABLE "Client" (
  "id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  "name" TEXT NULL,
  "ic" TEXT NULL,
  "dic" TEXT NULL,
  "street" TEXT NULL,
  "houseNumber" TEXT NULL,
  "city" TEXT NULL,
  "zipCode" TEXT NULL);

CREATE TABLE "Project" (
  "id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  "name" TEXT NULL,
  "client" INTEGER NULL,
  "start" TEXT NULL,
  "dueTo" TEXT NULL,
  "end" TEXT NULL,
  "active" INTEGER NOT NULL,
  "pricePerHour" INTEGER NOT NULL,
  "totalPrice" INTEGER NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT "client_fk"
    FOREIGN KEY ("client")
    REFERENCES "Client" ("id")
    DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED);

CREATE TABLE "TimeLog" (
  "id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
  "project" INTEGER NOT NULL,
  "description" TEXT NULL,
  "start" TEXT NULL,
  "end" TEXT NULL,
  "minutes" INTEGER NOT NULL,
  "pricePerHour" INTEGER NOT NULL,
  "price" INTEGER NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT "project_fk"
    FOREIGN KEY ("project")
    REFERENCES "Project" ("id")
    DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED);
ALTER TABLE Project ADD totalTime TEXT NULL;

CZ.name: Název
CZ.priceVatHigh: Cena zboží s vysokou sazbou DPH
CZ.priceVatFirstLower: Cena zboží s první sníženou sazbou DPH
CZ.priceVatSecondLower: Cena zboží s druhou sníženou sazbou DPH
CZ.totalPriceVatHigh: Celková cena zboží s vysokou sazbou DPH
CZ.totalPriceVatFirstLower: Celková cena zboží s první sníženou sazbou DPH
CZ.totalPriceVatSecondLower: Celková cena zboží s druhou sníženou sazbou DPH
